name: Mecha Musume + Gundam + Mecha Slider LoRA
description:
Mecha Musume + Gundam + Mecha Slider LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

I've been trying to make a mecha/gundam LoRA for a while now, but between me being picky and other creators making AWESOME ones, I never posted any.

I'm finally ready to share this one, even if today is one of the worst days of my life. I'll look back at this model and remember it.

I've tested it on all my models and on Counterfeit, and works an all of them and with all my negative embeddings in interesting ways. Regarding the weight, you'll get a middle ground change at weight 1, but this really works as a slider (as you can see from the final 2 comparisons). Adjust the weight from 0 to 2 for the desired effect.

Can make Gundam, Mecha, Mecha Musume, Bodysuits of different colors.

Have fun and consider leaving hearts and reactions.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1)
